member.returns: true if this instance is valid; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: This Funktion Is For The Future And Get Currently Not Evaluated Anywhere, So Devired Class Should Throw A NotImplementedException

member.name: M:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Datatypes.DataTypeBase`1.CompareTo(`0)
member.summary: Vergleicht die aktuelle Instanz mit einem anderen Objekt vom selben Typ und gibt eine ganze Zahl zurück, die angibt, ob die aktuelle Instanz in der Sortierreihenfolge vor oder nach dem anderen Objekt oder an derselben Position auftritt.
member.param: Ein Objekt, das mit dieser Instanz verglichen werden soll.
member.returns: Ein Wert, der die relative Reihenfolge der verglichenen Objekte angibt.Der Rückgabewert hat folgende Bedeutung:Wert Bedeutung Kleiner als 0 (null) Diese Instanz befindet sich in der Sortierreihenfolge vor . Zero Diese Instanz tritt in der Sortierreihenfolge an der gleichen Position wie auf. Größer als 0 (null) Diese Instanz folgt in der Sortierreihenfolge auf .

member.name: M:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Datatypes.DataTypeBase`1.Equals(`0)
member.summary: Gibt an, ob das aktuelle Objekt gleich einem anderen Objekt des gleichen Typs ist.
member.param: Ein Objekt, das mit diesem Objekt verglichen werden soll.
member.returns: true, wenn das aktuelle Objekt gleich dem -Parameter ist, andernfalls false.

member.name: T:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice
member.summary: Represent A Device Based On A Radio Frequency.

member.name: F:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.PRIMARYKEY
member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For PrimaryKey.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.PrimaryKey
member.summary: The Unique PrimarKey For This RF Device.

member.name: F:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.ID
member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For Id.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.Id
member.summary: Every Scenario Element (I.E. Transmitter, Receiver) Must Be Assigned An Unique Id. Negative Id’S Are Reserved For Receivers While All Other Id’S Are Transmitters By Default. Some Applications (I.E. Tdoa Emitter Localization) Require A Reference Transmitter. For These Applications Id=0 Is The Reference Transmitter. Receivers Must Be Assigned First In The Table, Followed Be Transmitters (With Id=0 Being The First). After The Static Scenario, Update Of Id’S Requires No Specific Order. Note That Definition Of New Transmitters/Receivers After The Static Scenario Is Prohibited.

member.name: F:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.DEVICESOURCE
member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For DeviceSource.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.DeviceSource
member.summary: The Source Of This RF Device.

member.name: F:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.STARTTIME
member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For StartTime.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.StartTime
member.summary: This Is The Simulation Time At Which The Parameters (Following The Time Parameter In The Same Line) Are Set. All Transmitters And Receivers Used In The Simulation Must Be Set At Start Of The Simulation, I.E. At Time=0. For Static Scenarios, Where Positions Or Characteristics Settings Never Change Throughout The Simulation, The Time Column Only Contains Zero’s.

member.name: F:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.NAME
member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For Name.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.Name
member.summary: A Short Describing Display Name For The RF Device.

member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For Roll.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.Roll
member.summary: These Parameters Set The Orientation Of Transmitter / Receiver Antennas. The Respective Antenna Type Is Defined By Antennatype. The Rf Simulation Uses The Antenna Orientation To Compute The Resulting Signal Power At The Receivers.

member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For AntennaType.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.AntennaType

member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For CenterFrequency_Hz.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.CenterFrequency_Hz
member.summary: For Transmitters (I.E. Id’s >= 0) This Parameter Defines Transmitter Signal Center Frequency [Hz]. For Receivers (I.E. Id’s < 0) This Parameter Is Currently Unused.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.Gain_dB
member.summary: For Transmitters (I.E. Id’s >= 0) This Parameter Defines Transmitter Signal Power [Dbm]. For Receivers (I.E. Id’s < 0) This Parameter Is Currently Unused.

member.summary: The PropertyName As ReadOnly String For SignalToNoiseRatio_dB.

member.name: P:SIGENCEScenarioTool.Models.RFDevice.SignalToNoiseRatio_dB
member.summary: For Receivers (I.E. Id’s < 0) This Parameter Is Imposes Gaussian White Noise To The Respective Receiver Signal. For Transmitters (I.E. Id’s >= 0) This Parameter Is Unused.
